trans-unit.source: You can replicate a <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> server to another <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> server. With this configuration, the data on the primary server is continuously replicated to a secondary server to secure your <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> repository. This ensures complete data recovery if the primary <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> server is lost.

seg-source.mrk: You can replicate a <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> server to another <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> server.

With this configuration, the data on the primary server is continuously replicated to a secondary server to secure your <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> repository.

This ensures complete data recovery if the primary <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> server is lost.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez répliquer un serveur <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> vers un autre serveur <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText>.

Avec cette configuration, les données sur le serveur primaire sont répliquées en continu vers un serveur secondaire pour sécuriser votre espace de stockage <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText>.

Cela garantit une récupération complète des données si le serveur primaire <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> est injoignable.
